sections.TOP: Seastone Chair026820nhurswx419qd5u1unttd0smd3w2jpzj1632782014-10-30T00:34:44ZSon Of Fire24907634{{Template:Conjecture}}[[File:Seastone_Chair.png|thumb|260px|[[Theon Greyjoy]] watches [[Balon Greyjoy|his father]] kneel to [[Robert Baratheon]] and [[Eddard Stark]] before the Seastone Chair]]TheÂ '''Seastone Chair''' â€‹isÂ an ancient throne of the [[Iron Islands]], sat upon by the [[King of the Iron Islands|Kings of the Iron Islands]].<ref>"[[Greyjoy Rebellion (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Seastone Chair is located on a dais, in the Great Hall of the Great Keep on [[Pyke (island)|Pyke]]. It is made of a block of oily black stone carved into the shape of a kraken. The legend says that it was found by the [[First Men]] on the shores of [[Old Wyk]] when they came to the Iron Islands.
